Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12748 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 10.0.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12748 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 10.0.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libvirt is earlier than 10.0.0-7, affected by CVE-2025-12748
